00026 template <class Key, class CacheObject>
00027 class TFileCachedProducerCompBase:
00028                      public icomp::CComponentBase,
00029                      virtual public TILockedProducer<Key, CacheObject>
00030 {
00031 public:
00032        typedef icomp::CComponentBase BaseClass;
00033        typedef TILockedProducer<Key, CacheObject> LockedProducerType;
00034 
00035        I_BEGIN_BASE_COMPONENT(TFileCachedProducerCompBase);
00036               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(LockedProducerType);
00037               I_ASSIGN(m_cacheLoaderCompPtr, "CacheLoader", "Loads and saves cached object to temporary file", true, "CacheLoader");
00038               I_TASSIGN(m_slaveCacheEngineCompPtr, "SlaveCacheEngine", "Slave cache engine providing access to cached object", true, "SlaveCacheEngine");
00039        I_END_COMPONENT;
00040 
00041        // reimplemented (iproc::TILockedProducer)
00042        virtual const CacheObject* ProduceLockedObject(const Key& key);
00043        virtual void UnlockObject(const CacheObject* objectPtr);
00044 
00045 protected:
00046        bool PushKeyBack(const Key& key);
00047 
00051        void CleanFileList();
00052 
00053        // methods for optional ovelloading
00054        virtual void OnCacheFileSaved(const Key& key, const istd::CString& cacheFilePath);
00055        virtual void OnCacheFileRemoved(const Key& key, const istd::CString& cacheFilePath);
00056 
00057        // abstract methods
00061        virtual istd::CString CalcCacheFilePath(const Key& key) const = 0;
00065        virtual int GetMaxCachedFilesCount() const = 0;
00066 
00067 private:
00068        I_REF(iser::IFileLoader, m_cacheLoaderCompPtr);
00069        I_TREF(LockedProducerType, m_slaveCacheEngineCompPtr);
00070 
00071        typedef std::map<Key, istd::CString> KeyToFileNameMap;
00072        typedef std::list<Key> RecentlyUsedKeys;
00073        typedef std::set<const CacheObject*> OwnedObjects;
00074 
00075        mutable KeyToFileNameMap m_keyToFileNameMap;
00076        mutable RecentlyUsedKeys m_recentlyUsedKeys;
00077        mutable OwnedObjects m_ownedObjects;
00078 };

00085 template <class Key, class CacheObject>
00086 const CacheObject* TFileCachedProducerCompBase<Key, CacheObject>::ProduceLockedObject(const Key& key)
00087 {
00088        if (m_cacheLoaderCompPtr.IsValid()){
00089               istd::CString cacheFilePath;
00090               typename KeyToFileNameMap::iterator foundIter = m_keyToFileNameMap.find(key);
00091               if (foundIter != m_keyToFileNameMap.end()){
00092                      cacheFilePath = foundIter->second;
00093                      I_ASSERT(!cacheFilePath.IsEmpty());
00094               }
00095               else{
00096                      cacheFilePath = CalcCacheFilePath(key);
00097               }
00098 
00099               if (!cacheFilePath.IsEmpty()){
00100                      if (m_cacheLoaderCompPtr->IsOperationSupported(
00101                                           NULL,
00102                                           &cacheFilePath,
00103                                           iser::IFileLoader::QF_NO_SAVING | iser::IFileLoader::QF_FILE_ONLY,
00104                                           false)){
00105                             istd::TDelPtr<CacheObject> objectPtr(new CacheObject);
00106 
00107                             if (objectPtr.IsValid()){
00108                                    if (m_cacheLoaderCompPtr->LoadFromFile(*objectPtr, cacheFilePath) == iser::IFileLoader::StateOk){
00109                                           m_ownedObjects.insert(objectPtr.GetPtr());
00110 
00111                                           return objectPtr.PopPtr();
00112                                    }
00113                                    else if (foundIter != m_keyToFileNameMap.end()){
00114                                           m_keyToFileNameMap.erase(foundIter);
00115                                    }
00116                             }
00117                      }
00118               }
00119        }
00120 
00121        if (m_slaveCacheEngineCompPtr.IsValid()){
00122               const CacheObject* objectPtr = m_slaveCacheEngineCompPtr->ProduceLockedObject(key);
00123               if (objectPtr != NULL){
00124                      istd::CString cacheFilePath = CalcCacheFilePath(key);
00125                      if (!cacheFilePath.IsEmpty() && m_cacheLoaderCompPtr.IsValid()){
00126                             if (m_cacheLoaderCompPtr->SaveToFile(*const_cast<CacheObject*>(objectPtr), cacheFilePath) == iser::IFileLoader::StateOk){
00127                                    OnCacheFileSaved(key, cacheFilePath);
00128 
00129                                    m_keyToFileNameMap[key] = cacheFilePath;
00130                                    m_recentlyUsedKeys.push_back(key);
00131 
00132                                    const_cast<TFileCachedProducerCompBase<Key, CacheObject>&>(*this).CleanFileList();
00133                             }
00134                      }
00135 
00136                      return objectPtr;
00137               }
00138        }
00139 
00140        return NULL;
00141 }

00144 template <class Key, class CacheObject>
00145 void TFileCachedProducerCompBase<Key, CacheObject>::UnlockObject(const CacheObject* objectPtr)
00146 {
00147        I_ASSERT(objectPtr != NULL);
00148 
00149        typename OwnedObjects::iterator foundIter = m_ownedObjects.find(objectPtr);
00150        if (foundIter != m_ownedObjects.end()){
00151               m_ownedObjects.erase(objectPtr);
00152 
00153               delete objectPtr;
00154 
00155               return;
00156        }
00157 
00158        if (m_slaveCacheEngineCompPtr.IsValid()){
00159               m_slaveCacheEngineCompPtr->UnlockObject(objectPtr);
00160        }
00161 }

00166 template <class Key, class CacheObject>
00167 bool TFileCachedProducerCompBase<Key, CacheObject>::PushKeyBack(const Key& key)
00168 {
00169        if (m_keyToFileNameMap.find(key) == m_keyToFileNameMap.end()){
00170               istd::CString cacheFilePath = CalcCacheFilePath(key);
00171               if (!cacheFilePath.IsEmpty()){
00172                      m_keyToFileNameMap[key] = cacheFilePath;
00173                      m_recentlyUsedKeys.push_back(key);
00174 
00175                      return true;
00176               }
00177        }
00178 
00179        return false;
00180 }
00181 
00182 
00183 template <class Key, class CacheObject>
00184 void TFileCachedProducerCompBase<Key, CacheObject>::CleanFileList()
00185 {
00186        int maxCachedFiles = GetMaxCachedFilesCount();
00187        I_ASSERT(maxCachedFiles >= 0);
00188 
00189        while (int(m_recentlyUsedKeys.size()) > maxCachedFiles){
00190               const istd::CString& key = m_recentlyUsedKeys.front();
00191 
00192               typename KeyToFileNameMap::iterator foundIter = m_keyToFileNameMap.find(key);
00193               if (foundIter != m_keyToFileNameMap.end()){
00194                      const istd::CString& cacheFilePath = foundIter->second;
00195 
00196                      if (remove(cacheFilePath.ToString().c_str()) != 0){
00197                             OnCacheFileRemoved(key, cacheFilePath);
00198                      }
00199 
00200                      m_keyToFileNameMap.erase(foundIter);
00201               }
00202 
00203               m_recentlyUsedKeys.pop_front();
00204        }
00205 }

00211 }
